title: pytest broken on master
body_html:
🐛 Bug

To Reproduce

KeyboardInterrupt
(/scratch/rzou/pt/master-env) [1] rzou@devfair0317:/scratch/rzou/pt/master (master) $ pytest test/test_torch.py -v
===================================================================== test session starts ======================================================================
platform linux -- Python 3.7.0, pytest-3.8.0, py-1.6.0, pluggy-0.7.1 -- /scratch/rzou/pt/master-env/bin/python
cachedir: .pytest_cache
rootdir: /scratch/rzou/pt/master, inifile:
collected 392 items

test/test_torch.py::TestTorchMixin::test_dir PASSED                                                                                                      [  0%]
test/test_torch.py::TestTorchMixin::test_doc FAILED                                                                                                      [  0%]
test/test_torch.py::TestTorchMixin::test_dot FAILED                                                                                                      [  0%]
test/test_torch.py::TestTorchMixin::test_ger FAILED                                                                                                      [  1%]
test/test_torch.py::TestTorchMixin::test_addr FAILED                                                                                                     [  1%]
test/test_torch.py::TestTorchMixin::test_addmv FAILED                                                                                                    [  1%]
test/test_torch.py::TestTorchMixin::test_addmm FAILED                                                                                                    [  1%]
test/test_torch.py::TestTorchMixin::test_allclose FAILED                                                                                                 [  2%]
test/test_torch.py::TestTorchMixin::test_linear_algebra_scalar_raises FAILED                                                                             [  2%]
test/test_torch.py::TestTorchMixin::test_sin ^C

test/test_torch.py:363: AttributeError
_________________________________________________________________ TestTorchMixin.test_allclose _________________________________________________________________

self = <test_torch.TestTorchMixin object at 0x7f1456e6da20>

    def test_allclose(self):
        x = torch.tensor([1.0, 2.0, 3.0])
        y = torch.tensor([1.01, 2.01, 3.01])
>       self.assertTrue(torch.allclose(x, y, rtol=0, atol=0.02))
E       AttributeError: 'TestTorchMixin' object has no attribute 'assertTrue'

test/test_torch.py:382: AttributeError
_______________________________________________________ TestTorchMixin.test_linear_algebra_scalar_raises _______________________________________________________

self = <test_torch.TestTorchMixin object at 0x7f1456fd9ba8>

    def test_linear_algebra_scalar_raises(self):
        m = torch.randn(5, 5)
        v = torch.randn(5)
        s = torch.tensor(7)
>       self.assertRaises(RuntimeError, lambda: torch.mv(m, s))
E       AttributeError: 'TestTorchMixin' object has no attribute 'assertRaises'

Expected behavior

Running tests with python works, but I am sad that pytest doesn't work anymore.

body:
## 🐛 Bug


## To Reproduce

```
KeyboardInterrupt
(/scratch/rzou/pt/master-env) [1] rzou@devfair0317:/scratch/rzou/pt/master (master) $ pytest test/test_torch.py -v
===================================================================== test session starts ======================================================================
platform linux -- Python 3.7.0, pytest-3.8.0, py-1.6.0, pluggy-0.7.1 -- /scratch/rzou/pt/master-env/bin/python
cachedir: .pytest_cache
rootdir: /scratch/rzou/pt/master, inifile:
collected 392 items

test/test_torch.py::TestTorchMixin::test_dir PASSED                                                                                                      [  0%]
test/test_torch.py::TestTorchMixin::test_doc FAILED                                                                                                      [  0%]
test/test_torch.py::TestTorchMixin::test_dot FAILED                                                                                                      [  0%]
test/test_torch.py::TestTorchMixin::test_ger FAILED                                                                                                      [  1%]
test/test_torch.py::TestTorchMixin::test_addr FAILED                                                                                                     [  1%]
test/test_torch.py::TestTorchMixin::test_addmv FAILED                                                                                                    [  1%]
test/test_torch.py::TestTorchMixin::test_addmm FAILED                                                                                                    [  1%]
test/test_torch.py::TestTorchMixin::test_allclose FAILED                                                                                                 [  2%]
test/test_torch.py::TestTorchMixin::test_linear_algebra_scalar_raises FAILED                                                                             [  2%]
test/test_torch.py::TestTorchMixin::test_sin ^C

test/test_torch.py:363: AttributeError
_________________________________________________________________ TestTorchMixin.test_allclose _________________________________________________________________

self = <test_torch.TestTorchMixin object at 0x7f1456e6da20>

    def test_allclose(self):
        x = torch.tensor([1.0, 2.0, 3.0])
        y = torch.tensor([1.01, 2.01, 3.01])
>       self.assertTrue(torch.allclose(x, y, rtol=0, atol=0.02))
E       AttributeError: 'TestTorchMixin' object has no attribute 'assertTrue'

test/test_torch.py:382: AttributeError
_______________________________________________________ TestTorchMixin.test_linear_algebra_scalar_raises _______________________________________________________

self = <test_torch.TestTorchMixin object at 0x7f1456fd9ba8>

    def test_linear_algebra_scalar_raises(self):
        m = torch.randn(5, 5)
        v = torch.randn(5)
        s = torch.tensor(7)
>       self.assertRaises(RuntimeError, lambda: torch.mv(m, s))
E       AttributeError: 'TestTorchMixin' object has no attribute 'assertRaises'


```

## Expected behavior

Running tests with python works, but I am sad that pytest doesn't work anymore.
